name: Capture
overview:
Established in the year 2008, we, “Capture”, are one of the prominent manufacturers and suppliers of the finest range of Denims, Trousers, Shirts & T-Shirts. The jeans and shorts offered by us are made using premium quality denim fabrics, threads and other material procured from some of the most trusted vendors of the industry.

Team of Experts: Designers Stitching experts Dyers Quality controllers Packaging experts Storage experts

Our Infrastructure: We have an advanced infrastructure, which is located at Goregaon (East), Mumbai. The infrastructure is equipped with all the requisite machines & tools and modern technology that allow us to develop the finest collection of Denims, Trousers, Shirts & T-Shirts to the customers.

Our Quality Assurance: We are committed to offer a creatively-designed range of Denims, Trousers, Shirts & T-Shirts in the market. These jeans & shorts are designed as per the latest fashion trends in the market. Clients’ preferences and demands are also considered while designing the range offered by us. fine quality products to the clients.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organisation, we offer the exclusive collection of Denims, Trousers, Shirts & T-Shirts to the clients. The jeans & shorts offered by us are designed as per the preferences of our clients, which helps us in attaining maximum level of customer satisfaction.
